channel.title: CVE Feed for Nvidia Corporation -- NVIDIA Windows GPU Display Driver
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Nvidia Corporation -- NVIDIA Windows GPU Display Driver

item.title: CVE-2017-6260|2024-08-05T15:25:48.745Z -- nvidia%20corporation -- nvidia%20windows%20gpu%20display%20driver
item.description: NVIDIA Windows GPU Display Driver contains a vulnerability in the kernel mode layer helper function where an incorrect calculation of string length may lead to denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2017-6251|2024-08-05T15:25:48.469Z -- nvidia%20corporation -- nvidia%20windows%20gpu%20display%20driver
item.description: NVIDIA Windows GPU Display Driver contains a vulnerability in the kernel mode layer handler where a missing permissions check may allow users to gain access to arbitrary physical system memory, which may lead to an escalation of privileges.

item.title: CVE-2017-6256|2024-08-05T15:25:48.635Z -- nvidia%20corporation -- nvidia%20windows%20gpu%20display%20driver
item.description: NVIDIA Windows GPU Display Driver contains a vulnerability in the kernel mode layer (nvlddmkm.sys) handler for DxgkDdiEscape where a value passed from a user to the driver is not correctly validated and used as the index to an array which may lead to denial of service or potential escalation of privileges.

item.title: CVE-2017-6255|2024-08-05T15:25:48.473Z -- nvidia%20corporation -- nvidia%20windows%20gpu%20display%20driver
item.description: NVIDIA Windows GPU Display Driver contains a vulnerability in the kernel mode layer (nvlddmkm.sys) handler for DxgkDdiEscape where an improper input parameter handling may lead to a denial of service or potential escalation of privileges.

item.title: CVE-2017-6252|2024-08-05T15:25:48.455Z -- nvidia%20corporation -- nvidia%20windows%20gpu%20display%20driver
item.description: NVIDIA Windows GPU Display Driver contains a vulnerability in the kernel mode layer handler where a NULL pointer dereference may lead to a denial of service or potential escalation of privileges.

item.title: CVE-2017-6254|2024-08-05T15:25:48.679Z -- nvidia%20corporation -- nvidia%20windows%20gpu%20display%20driver
item.description: NVIDIA Windows GPU Display Driver contains a vulnerability in the kernel mode layer (nvlddmkm.sys) handler for DxgkDdiEscape where a pointer passed from an user to the driver is used without validation which may lead to denial of service or potential escalation of privileges.
